title: Support, Resistance, & Volume Zones
description: Master the identification and analysis of key price levels. Learn to spot support, resistance, and volume zones that drive market psychology.

modules.title: Price Level Psychology
modules.description: Understand the psychology behind support and resistance levels

lessons.title: Support & Resistance Basics
lessons.content:
Support and resistance are psychological price levels where buyers and sellers congregate. Understanding these levels is crucial for entry and exit timing.

**Support Levels:**
â€¢ Price level where buying interest increases
â€¢ Previous lows that held
â€¢ Round numbers and psychological levels
â€¢ Areas of accumulation
â€¢ Stop-loss clusters

**Resistance Levels:**
â€¢ Price level where selling interest increases
â€¢ Previous highs that held
â€¢ Round numbers and psychological levels
â€¢ Areas of distribution
â€¢ Take-profit clusters

**Why Levels Work:**
â€¢ Self-fulfilling prophecy
â€¢ Institutional order placement
â€¢ Retail trader psychology
â€¢ Technical analysis convergence

lessons.title: Level Identification
lessons.content:
**Visual Identification:**
â€¢ Multiple touches at same level
â€¢ Strong rejection candles
â€¢ Volume spikes at levels
â€¢ Price action respect
â€¢ Time spent at level

**Level Types:**
â€¢ Static (horizontal lines)
â€¢ Dynamic (trending levels)
â€¢ Psychological (round numbers)
â€¢ Fibonacci levels
â€¢ Pivot points

**Confirmation Methods:**
â€¢ Multiple timeframes
â€¢ Volume analysis
â€¢ Price action patterns
â€¢ Market structure

modules.title: Volume Zone Analysis
modules.description: Learn to identify and analyze volume zones

lessons.title: Volume Profile
lessons.content:
**Volume Profile Concepts:**
â€¢ Point of Control (POC)
â€¢ Value Area (VA)
â€¢ High Volume Nodes (HVN)
â€¢ Low Volume Nodes (LVN)
â€¢ Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP)

**Volume Zone Types:**
â€¢ High volume = strong level
â€¢ Low volume = weak level
â€¢ Volume gap = potential target
â€¢ Volume cluster = support/resistance

**Trading Applications:**
â€¢ Entry timing
â€¢ Exit planning
â€¢ Risk management
â€¢ Position sizing

lessons.title: Volume Zone Trading
lessons.content:
**Volume Zone Strategies:**
â€¢ Buy at support with volume
â€¢ Sell at resistance with volume
â€¢ Avoid low volume areas
â€¢ Use volume gaps as targets

**Risk Management:**
â€¢ Stop loss below support
â€¢ Take profit at resistance
â€¢ Position size based on volume
â€¢ Multiple confirmations

**Advanced Concepts:**
â€¢ Volume divergence
â€¢ Volume climax
â€¢ Volume dry-up
â€¢ Institutional activity

modules.title: Level Trading Strategies
modules.description: Develop strategies for trading support and resistance levels

lessons.title: Level Breakout Trading
lessons.content:
**Breakout Confirmation:**
â€¢ Strong volume on breakout
â€¢ Price closes beyond level
â€¢ Multiple timeframes confirm
â€¢ No false breakouts

**Breakout Types:**
â€¢ Clean breakout (strong)
â€¢ False breakout (weak)
â€¢ Retest breakout (normal)
â€¢ Gap breakout (strong)

**Entry Strategies:**
â€¢ Breakout entry
â€¢ Retest entry
â€¢ Pullback entry
â€¢ Momentum entry

**Risk Management:**
â€¢ Stop loss below breakout level
â€¢ Position sizing
â€¢ Multiple confirmations
â€¢ Time-based exits
